datasource.name: sps_analytics
datasource.sql: insert into sps_analytics.themes_interactions(session_id, event, displayname, themefile_name, datasource_name, site, profile) values([string: sessionid], 'THEME_VISIBILITY_CHANGED', [string: displayname], [string: themename], [string: datasourcename], [string: site], [string: profile])

insert into sps_analytics.button_clicks(session_id, event, displayname, buttonname, buttontype, site, profile) values([string: sessionid], 'BUTTON_CLICKED', [string: displayname], [string: buttonname], [string: buttontype], [string: site], [string: profile])

insert into sps_analytics.search_results(session_id, service, title, text, wkt, site, profile) values([string: sessionid], [string: service], [string:title], [string: text], [string: wkt], [string: site], [string: profile])

datasource.name: sps_session_info
datasource.sql: insert into sps_analytics.session_info(session_id, afdeling, ad_object, site, profile) values([string: session_id], [string: afdeling], [string: ad_object], [string: site], [string: profile])
